overview: Elvis Presley - The CBS Concert Recordings, Omaha, Nebraska 06-19-1977. This is one of the last Elvis Presley concert recordings, filmed by CBS Television in 1977. An honest representation of the King of Rock and Roll's final days on the stage.
tagline: An honest representation of the King of Rock and Roll's final days on the stage.
title: Elvis Presley CBS Concert in Omaha, Nebraska (1977)
